Eva understood that if we don't learn from our history, we're doomed to repeat it. Though the Holocaust has ended, the forces of hatred that were unleashed then, persist today. We must honor her, and all victims of genocide, by learning from the sins of the past. #EvaEducationDay

We pay tribute to all who were lost, and give thanks for those who survived, including Eva Kor, who passed away last year. She spent part of her childhood in Auschwitz, and settled in Indiana later in life, where she worked to teach Hoosiers of all ages about the Holocaust.

Today is #HolocaustRemembranceDay and the 75th anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz-Birkenau. Of the 12 million people systematically killed during the Holocaust, more than 1 million perished at this camp alone.
